Ted is the CTO of RenditionDigital International. Before he joined RDI, he had various software development roles and also spent time as trainer at IBM Advanced Career Education, Ateneo ITI, and Asia Pacific College. He spent many years in software development dating back to Turbo C, Clipper, dBase IV, and Visual Basic. Eventually, he found Java and spent many years there. Nowadays, he’s busy with other things like Javascript and Android.

Ted is also busy conducting trainings on full-stack JS, Android and other tech areas. He’s also the author of Learn Android Studio 3, Apress publishing

He maintains a blog of sorts, at tedhagos.com/notes
